summary: This mod as a Novice level alteration spell for mining out ore veins.
descriptionHtml:
Tired of carrying around a pickaxe as a mage? Disgusted by having to soil your hands doing labor fit for the mundane? No more. Inspired by Dementor\'s \"Mining for Mages\", this mod adds a novice level alteration spell to the game for mining out ore deposits.  Go to your local court mage or Tolfdir, if a member of the College, and purchase the SpellTome: Extract Ore. Simply cast the spell at an ore vein until it is empty.  In the interests of maintaining maximum compatibility I\'ve not altered the mining script to give alteration experience, so you won\'t gain any levels by casting this spell. This is merely a mining spell crafted to my own tastes, if you don\'t care for my implementation or want to bring magic to other aspects of Smithing I recommend you check out \"Mining for Mages\" by Dementor.

Cleaned with TES5Edit.
author: SirMAD

files.name: MAD Magical Mining v1_1
files.changelogHtml: Added alternate version that doesn't modify leveled lists see ReadMe for details.
